metadata.title: CVE-2014-2572 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
mod/assign/externallib.php in Moodle 2.6.x before 2.6.2 does not properlyhandle assignment web-service parameters, which might allow remoteauthenticated users to modify grade metadata via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2572` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.6.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.2').
